name: BulletRoyal
description:
Made for Bullet Hell Jam 2022

Basics

Try to survive the longest last player alive at the end wins uses steam multiplayer so you don't have to port forward you can invite people through steam.

Every time you get hit you get knocked back and it adds knockback to future hits.

Controls

WASD  movement.

"Space" Dash in the direction you're looking.

"Shift" Shove to players in front of you.

P If you're the host will start the game wait for your friends before you start the game otherwise they'll join as spectators

Multiplayer

Create a game on the main menu. 

Friends should be able to find it to the browser if they can't, Change your steam download region to the same one in the steam launcher

Settings

Couldn't finish a settings menu in time so if you want to change the game settings you can change them at BulletRoyal\Saved\Config\Windows\GameUserSettings.ini

I would recommend changing the render scale if you have FPS issues

Known issues

You may see people get hit on your screen but not take damage they dodged it on their end and I didn't have enough time to clean up all the not code

If someone leaves the game prematurely it may not announce the winner when there's one player left this can be fixed by creating a new lobby

In rare cases the steam overlay may not launch on startup we are looking into this issue

Thank you if you decide to play!

We had a lot of fun with this game jam! we weren't able to finish everything I wanted but I'm pretty happy with how it turned out!
